item.title: R Script Automation on Windows
item.description: Automation made simple Automation of R scripts is an incredibly powerful tool to have at your disposal. In its simplest form, the ease by which you can automate an R script is almost laughable. You do not need much to start. You will need an R script of your choice, here I give a fun yet largely useless example. You will need a text editor (notepad will do fine) to create your batch file.
